power.title: Blistering Flourish
power.fluff: Executing movements in a complex pattern brings forth elemental fire to aid the next attack you make

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Dexterity modifier fire damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier fire damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, your melee attacks deal extra fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier. This damage does not apply if the attack already has a damage type other than fire.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2 + your Charisma modifier extra fire damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 4 + your Charisma modifier extra fire damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed. Enemies that hit you with reactive strikes provoked by this movement take fire damage equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 4 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + your Charisma modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.
